titleStmt.title: Act for securing Mr. James Guthrie and others. At Edinburgh the 23. day of August, 1660.
titleStmt.author: Scotland. Parliament. Committee of Estates.

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed by a Society of Stationers,

notesStmt.note: Signed at end: Extracted forth of the books of the said Committee, by me Jo. Hay. cler. Com.
Reproduction of the original in the National Library of Scotland.
